#summary This page explain how to use robotframework ant task.

= Introduction =

Robotframework ant task inherit from the core [http://ant.apache.org/manual/Tasks/jar.html java] task.

Robotframework ant task use same parameters and propose the following ones

= Parameters =

|| Attribute || Description || Required ||
| name | set the --name option | No |
| suite | set the --suite option | No |
| test | set the --test option | No |
| variablefile | set the --variablefile option | No |
| outputdir | set the --outputdir option | No |
| loglevel | set the --loglevel option | No |
| debugfile | set the --debugfile option | No |
